Scale a data.frame by column or row

Source: R/Common.R
scaleDF.Rd

Scale a data.frame by column or row

scaleDF(
  df,
  byRow = FALSE,
  byColumn = FALSE,
  center = TRUE,
  scale = TRUE,
  maxUnit = 4,
  returnRaw = F
)

Arguments

byRow

Default FALSE
byColumn

Default FALSE, by column
center

Default TRUE. Mean = 0
scale

Default TRUE. 0-1 scale
maxUnit

Default 4
returnRaw

if TRUE, return raw dataframe

Value

Examples
